mapper.insert: insert into material (id, material_id, material_name, UPDATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_BY, REVISION) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{revision,jdbcType=INTEGER})
